pathConfig.downloadPlaylists_comment: Path to downloaded playlists directory, often I use './'
pathConfig.nonLocalMusic_comment: Path to non-local music directory, such as location on a Plex server

spotifyAPIConfig.cachePath_comment: Path to cache file for Spotify API, this caches the users access token
spotifyAPIConfig.sleepTime_comment: Time to sleep between requests to avoid rate limiting

plexConfig.baseURL_comment: Base URL for Plex server, e.g. http://plexServer:32400
